Response.Say: Our next meeting will be a picnic in Golden Gate Park on Sunday, August twentieth. We will be in the meadow near Fulton and 30th Avenue. On the twenty-seventy we will resume regular meetings at the church of St. John the Evangelist, 1661 15th Street in San Francisco, near the 16th Street Mission bart.
If you'd like to register or learn more, please leave a message with your phone number or email address at the tone.
